PAGE.NAME: select
PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This script is intended to test that default values get set correctly in SELECT dropdowns and RADIO button groups. To test this, do the following: 1) note that the default "blue" is chosen for the first page. 2) choose "green" instead. 3) hit "Next". 4) Note that "BSD" is selected as default. 5) Choose OSX and then hit "Previous". 6) Note that "green" is selected, so that user choice overrides the default. 7) Hit "next" and note that "OSX" is selected, again letting user choice override the default.
PAGE.TITLE: Select dropdown test
